byline.original: By BENJAMIN WEISER and ELI ROSENBERG

abstract: American Civil Liberties Union of New Jersey is enlisted to defend Chelsea bombing suspect Ahmad Khan Rahami on federal charges until he is provided federal public defender or other lawyer.
lead_paragraph: A dispute continues over what jurisdiction should provide a lawyer for Mr. Rahami, who faces federal charges in both New York and New Jersey for two bombings.
snippet: A dispute continues over what jurisdiction should provide a lawyer for Mr. Rahami, who faces federal charges in both New York and New Jersey for two bombings....

headline.main: Ahmad Khan Rahami’s Father and Wife Retain A.C.L.U. to Defend Him
headline.print_headline: Two Relatives Get A.C.L.U.  to Represent Bomb Suspect
